mdx.rawBody:
Song: sElai kattum
Film: kodi parakkudhu

Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d2 n2 S

kaNdadhuNdA kaNdavargaL sonnadhuNdA

Stanza 1:
ohh ohh    ohh   koondhalukuLLE oru veedu kattungaL  kAdhalukuLLE kidaiyAdhu sattangaL
dn  dndSnd pmr   m   m  p p  n  mm  m  m  p  n  p    m m  p p  n  m m  m m   p  n  p

hA hAa          Ayiram uNdu ennOdu machangaL Ayinum enna nenjOdu achangaL

Anandha sangamathil acham varumA

pookkaLai kiLLuvadhal ratham varumA
S   S R   S  S R S    m m    p n pnp

(idhupOl idhamO)

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
hoo ooo kadhal veNNila kaiyOdu vandhadhO kaNgaL reNdumE katcheri paNNudhO
hoo ooo mohamandhiram kaNNOdu uLLadhO moodu mandhiram peNNOdu uLLadhO
meenukku thooNdilittal yAnai vandhadhu
megathai thoodhu vittai vAnam vandhadhu
(idhupOl idhamO)
